price: 46. Ou qu’Il ne les surprendra pas, alors qu’ils vaquent à leurs activités (habituelles), sans qu’ils puissent Le tenir en échec ?
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
